name: The SIMIAN Institute
description:
The SIMIAN Institute is a first-person puzzle horror game in which the player finds themself trapped in a closed down museum. With only the help of a fellow unfortunate soul locked in the admissions booth, the player must explore environments inspired by ancient history, solve puzzles by manipulating maps, and evade a variety of creatures lurking among the exhibits…

Developed by Prime Television:

Steve Sturm ---------- Producer, Writer, Sound Design
Addy Crowell --------- Design, Programming
Sara Nelson ---------- Art, Modelling, UI
Gregory Herron ------- Art, Modelling
Noah Ferguson -------- Programming
Ben Lea -------------- Programming, Design
David Budnik --------- Art, Modelling

"Mourning Song" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"End of the Era" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
